mapper.select: select bxgs,sum(zfy) as xbbf from ${year}xbsj where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and qdrq >=#{dateFrom} and qdrq <=#{dateTo} group by bxgs;
select bxgs,sum(zfy) as rbbf from ${year}rbsj where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and chudanrq >=#{dateFrom} and chudanrq <=#{dateTo} group by bxgs;
select bxgs,sum(jqxbf) as jqxyjjsje from ${year}xbsj where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and qdrq >=#{dateFrom} and qdrq <=#{dateTo} group by bxgs;
select bxgs,sum(jqxbf) as jqxyjjsje from ${year}rbsj where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and chudanrq >=#{dateFrom} and chudanrq <=#{dateTo} group by bxgs;
select bxgs,sum(syxbf) as syxyjjsje from ${year}xbsj where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and qdrq >=#{dateFrom} and qdrq <=#{dateTo} group by bxgs;
select bxgs,sum(syxbf) as syxyjjsje from ${year}rbsj where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and chudanrq >=#{dateFrom} and chudanrq <=#{dateTo} group by bxgs;

select a.bxgs,sum(b.wxsrll) as xbsgccz from #{year}xbsj a inner join ${year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and b.jssj <= a.zbsj and b.jssj >= #{dateFrom} and b.jssj <= #{dateTo} group by a.bxgs

select a.bxgs,sum(b.wxsrll) as rbsgccz from #{year}xbsj a inner join ${year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and b.jssj <= a.zbsj and b.jssj >= #{dateFrom} and b.jssj <= #{dateTo} group by a.bxgs
select bxgs,sum(syxbf) as syxzbf,count(cjh) as cls from ${year}xbsj where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and qdrq >=#{dateFrom} and qdrq <= #{dateTo} group by bxgs
select bxgs,sum(syxbf) as syxzbf,count(cjh) as cls from ${year}xbsj where bxgs !='' and bxgs is not null and chudrq >=#{dateFrom} and chudrq <= #{dateTo} group by bxgs
